short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful, free, and open-source browser extension. Create screenshot and video recording directly from your browser. It's free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple and free screen recorder tool. Create screenshot and video recording directly from your browser. 

- 🆓 Free
- 🌐 open-source 
- 🙅‍♂️ no limits

Key Features:
 📸 Easy Capture Screenshots
 🖍 Annotate and Edit Screenshots
 🚀 Instant Sharing
    ▸ Save as file
    ▸ Share by link
  🎥 Screen Recording (WEBM): 
    ▸ Record your entire screen,
    ▸ Record browser tabs 

Formats: 
- Video - WEBM
- Screenshot - PNG
